text: Claudio Capone (18 November 1952 â€“ 23 June 2008) was an Italian voice actor and narrator. After a career as a child actor on stage and television, Capone found work as a voice actor, giving his voice to Luke Skywalker in the Italian version of the Star Wars original trilogy. He also worked as a narrator for the scientific show Superquark with Piero Angela. Capone died of a stroke in Perth on 23 June 2008, aged 55, after having been sick for several days. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Italian voice actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Child actors Category:Actors from Rome Category:Disease-related deaths in Scotland Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Claudio Capone
